title: my game keeps crashing in champ select
body: this has never happened before but already twice today first time was in a ranked game and now again in normal i'm not sure if its on my end or yours but can someone from riot tell me what i can do to fix it? this has never happened before

replies.body: There were some service instability issues in the evening, and ranked queues were disabled.  We had it tracked in our[ service status ](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)page.  Everything should be running alright now!  Let me know if you are still experiencing any issues!
Same, I've tried disabling everything I can think of.
It's happening to me consistently too. It's really starting to aggravate me
